short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You Donate While You Shop - Shop at participating online merchants and a portion of the transaction goes directly to your schools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DPSF Fund Our Future browser reminder allows members of the  powered by ShareRewards to be easily reminded when they visit an online merchant that is also part of the Denton Independent School District. Members will be notified with a popup which allows them to click through to the DPSF Fund Our Future or ignore the notice and continue shopping normally.
